traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoying voice

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: body purist

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: careful shooter

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemical fascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemical interest

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepy breathing

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fast learner

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fast walker

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: great memory

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hard worker

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally kind. he has a special way of using kind words to brighten someone's day. he never insults others, and never judges people by their appearance.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: night owl

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychically deaf

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychically dull

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychically hypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychically sensitive

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quick sleeper

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slow learner

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringly ugly

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: too smart

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: tortured artist

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: transhumanist

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: very neurotic

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description:
NAME is gives a strange impression to the opponent.
(Ferian Race)
traits.name: mysteriousenergy

traits.description:
Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description:
Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
(Humanoid Alien Races 2.0)
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description:
A Giants with giantism is said to grow up to 30 feet. Not only his heights, but his skin grows thicker. To compensate for such growth, Timmy must eat more.
(The GiantRace)
traits.name: giantism

traits.description:
Timmy was titled a great warrior after striking down a dangerous beast single-handedly.
(The GiantRace)
traits.name: monsterhunter

traits.description:
Timmy has the traits of a dragon so they are considered very good to look at, intellegent, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and less tolerant of others.
(Kilhn Race)
traits.name: dragonattribute

traits.description:
Timmy has the characteristics of an elder dragon so they are considered extremely good to look at, of superior intellegent, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and less tolerant of others.
(Kilhn Race)
traits.name: elderdragoncharacteristic

traits.description:
Timmy has the aspect of an ancient dragon so they are considered bewitching to look at, of vast intellegence, but are still beasts at their core giving them an edge in survival, but also makes them territorial and extremely less tolerant of others.
(Kilhn Race)
traits.name: ancientdragonaspect

traits.description:
Timmy has the manifestation of an ancient elder dragon so they are considered beyond bewitching to look at, of unending intellegence, but are no mere beasts, they are almost beyond mortal limits almost guaranteeing survival, these beings will be territorial and will not tolerate others whom they are frustrated with.
(Kilhn Race)
traits.name: ancientelderdragonmanifestation

traits.description:
Timmy spent his entire life among trees and wild animals. It definitely changed his behavior. Timmy won't be upset if he eats raw food without a table. he doesn't care about sleeping on the floor, outside or having damaged clothes, although he prefers to wear at least something.
(Elders Faction)
traits.name: inharmonywithnature

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
the Marvelous gift of glitterworld bionics. Humanoid with cat ears and tail.
(Nyaron race)
races.name: nyaron

races.description:
Ferian is Developed by advanced genetic engineering. They have fast speed and high intelligence, and their lives are a little longer. However, there is a downside that it is not suitable for physical labor. They don't care whether they eat raw food or sleep in a cold place or sleep on the floor.
(Ferian Race)
races.name: ferian

races.description:
A gigantic creature that averages a height of 16 feet. Requires more food and has lower intellects, but the thick skin and sheer mass results in devastating strength.
(The GiantRace)
races.name: giant

races.description:
A bloodthirsty vulpine near-human.
(Revia Race)
races.name: revia

races.description:
Arachne race lineage can be traced back to Arachne homeworld where the temperature fluctuate between cold and warm.
Arachnes over thousands of generations began to adapt to these temperature and ables themselves to withstand cold but in return have less tolerance to the heat
(Arachne Race)
races.name: arachne

races.description:
A Baphomet that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: baphomet

races.description:
A mutant of the catgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: catgirl

races.description:
A Centaur that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: centaur

races.description:
A Cowgirl that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: cowgirl

races.description:
A mutant of the Dragon species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: dragon

races.description:
A mutant of the Forest Fairy species that has developed a semblance of intelligence./n A fragile existence that withers in a toxic environment.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: forestfairy

races.description:
A mutant of the foxgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: foxgirl

races.description:
A Harpy that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: harpy

races.description:
A mutant of the Ice Fairy species that has developed a semblance of intelligence./n A fragile existence that cannot survive warm temperatures.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: icefairy

races.description:
A mutant accumulation of slimy liquid that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: slime

races.description:
A mutant of the Thrumbogirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: thrumbogirl

races.description:
A mutant of the wolfgirl species that has developed a semblance of intelligence.
(Monstergirl Races)
races.name: wolfgirl

races.description:
A race of intelligent insectoids. They have a pair of antennae and an extended abdomen with four legs, but are still close enough to humans in intelligence and shape that human societies in some parts of the galaxy have accepted them.
(Klickmala Race (Humanoid Insect Alien Race))
races.name: klickmala

races.description:
A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs.
        
        Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects
        Less resistant to cold temperatures
        Over 40% faster running speed
        Generally fine-featured and attractive
        Somewhat Neurotic
(Bun Race)
races.name: bun

races.description:
A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs.
        
        Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects
        Less resistant to cold temperatures
        Over 40% faster running speed
        Generally fine-featured and attractive
        Somewhat Neurotic
(Bun Race)
races.name: bun

races.description:
A tribe of rabbit-like humanoids. They are small and weak, but have powerful legs.
        
        Small bodies leave them roughly 15% weaker in nearly all respects
        Less resistant to cold temperatures
        Over 40% faster running speed
        Generally fine-featured and attractive
        Somewhat Neurotic
(Bun Race)
races.name: bun

races.description:
A weird being.
(Anthro Race)
races.name: anthro

races.description:
A bipedal, human-like creature with a mixture of fishy features. Ikquans like water and are just as intelligent as humans, allowing them to integrate with human societies in some areas of the galaxy.
(Ikquan Race (Humanoid Fish Alien Race))
races.name: ikquan

races.description:
Lapelli is Developed by advanced genetic engineering. They are strong, strong in strength and stamina, suitable for simple labor, and prefer close combat. They don't care whether they eat raw food or sleep in a cold place or sleep on the floor.
(Lapelli Race)
races.name: lapelli

races.description:
Descended from a splinter group of Rockmen who rejected their species' violent ways long ago, the Crystalmen are almost completely unknown in the galaxy, having hidden from all other sentient life.

+ Lockdown ability : Enclose your enemies or protect yourself. 
+ Thanks to their crystalline epidermis, their toxic sensitivity is reduced by 20% human-wise.
+ Their travels through space emptiness and thousand millenniums has strengthened their body by 25% compared to a weak human.
- Resistance comes with a -10% burden movement speed.
- Crystalmen have appetite! As they say in the homeworlds, 4 Crystalmen will eat like 5.

Lockdown ability :
- Lockdown is only usable when your Crystalline is drafted.
- Indoors : Lockdown will spawn crystals blocks to shut doors.
- Outdoors : Lockdown will spawn an age dependant radius circle of crystal blocks. 50 tiles radius Lockdowns can be easily achieved by thousand years elders.
- Crystallines under 20, wont be able to lockdown outdoors.
- Lockdown blocks will wear off after 20 seconds. They can also be attacked, deconstructed or mined. 
- Lockdown ability has a 1 minute cooldown.
- Lockdown blocks wont spawn on pawns, mature trees, buildings, nor walls.
- /!\ Watch out where the blocks spawn. Any of the following will end up destroyed : food, plant matters, drugs, organs, stone/wood weapons, rotten bodies.
- In their chest, Crystalmen have a heart. It will trigger Lockdown when harvested, then used.
(Crystal race)
races.name: crystal

races.description:
They are violent and tempery.
(Avian Races)
races.name: cassowaryman

races.description:
It may be delicious if baked.
(Avian Races)
races.name: chickenman

races.description:
It resembles an extinct bird...
(Avian Races)
races.name: dodoman

races.description:
Its cute.
(Avian Races)
races.name: owlman

races.description:
Colorful Birds are screech talking!
(Avian Races)
races.name: parrotman

races.description:
Mysterius artificial races. It was made to be neoteny for pet. Somehow they are exacerbating humans.
(Avian Races)
races.name: penguinman

races.description:
Good Scarf, Good looking.
(Avian Races)
races.name: vultureman

races.description:
A small, squat humanoid with large, droopy ears and glowing yellow eyes. They are mostly harmless and easily scared off by larger humanoids.
(Cutebold Race)
races.name: cutebold

races.description:
A race of cave-dwelling, small reptilian humanoids.
(Pawnbold Race)
races.name: kobold

races.description:
An intelligent, bipedal reptilian creature with a mixture of human and snake-like anatomy. They have integrated almost seamlessly with human society in some parts of the galaxy.
(Slither Race)
races.name: slither

races.description:
A mysterious race of half-human, half-thrumbo. No one knows for sure if the Thrumboians are natives whom have kept in hiding till now, a genetic experiement, or something else. However, there is no denying their natural abilities are above average.
(Thrumboian Race)
races.name: thrumboian

races.description:
A baseline kilhn. These people are proud decendants of an ancient dragoniod race, though their true origins remain a mystery. They are capable hunters boasting increased survivability in almost any climate as they have strong defences and natural weapons. The average Kilhn can live easily to 1500 years old. They dislike the cold and survive on solely a meat diet. They are naturally greedy and fairly lazy, as such they work slower, gather less, make for poor farmers, and generally dislike manual labor unless it's related to hunting.
(Kilhn Race)
races.name: kilhn

races.description:
Extremely powerful space lizards.
(Frieza Race)
races.name: frieza

races.description:
A fairly primitive race, the Gerzee mostly spend their lives foraging for plants, running from large predators, and socializing with the family that have not yet been eaten by those large predators. Though the Gerzee tower in size over most humanoid species, being a fairly small and herbivorous prey species on their home planet means they’ve evolved to run at the first sign of danger. This timid nature and their comparative strength have made them attractive stock for space slavers, and so the Gerzee have just started to be introduced to modern technologies as they deal with these foreign attacks.

With their four eyes on top of their flat head, bulky bodies, and large arms, most humanoid equipment simply doesn’t fit the Gerzee physique. They’re only able to squeeze into some loose or adjustable clothing (e.g. parkas, dusters, masks, flak gear), handle some of the “larger” melee weapons (e.g. spears, horns, swords), and use ranged weapons that don’t require “normal-sized” fingers to pull the trigger (i.e. a minigun).

				

Another technology that surprisingly doesn’t work for the Gerzee is the act of cooking food. However, it’s unclear as to why cooking plants makes them inedible for the Gerzee biology, since slavers don’t mind feeding them cheap hay and glitterworlds have not been interested in researching the answer for such a primitive species.
(Gerzee Race)
races.name: gerzee

races.description:
The Lanius are described as a metallic scavenger race prone to aggression, whose biological composition somehow drains oxygen from the rooms they occupy, making them potentially deadly adversaries.

The Lanius are scavengers – metallic lifeforms that rely on the absorption of minerals to sustain themselves. Their society ebbs and flows in hibernation cycles; they may lie dormant for many years, even while hurtling through space. As soon as they become aware of significant metal deposits they reawaken. Usually this occurs in the dying stages of a galactic civilization or in the wake of intergalactic war.

Reports of reawakened Lanius have appeared in many of the war-torn and abandoned sectors of Federation Space. Their arrival has created panic as they indiscriminately seek out sources of metal – although more diplomatic individuals have suggested that they can be reasoned with.

+/- Drains oxygen from rooms. Non lanius, breathing creatures will faint, have brain injury and eventually die if they stay for too long in the room. Mechanoids are immune to Asphyxia.
+ Fires in oxygen drained rooms will get extinguished.
- Movement speed reduced by 5%.
+ Resists to extreme temperature thresholds and to space void.
(Lanius race)
races.name: lanius

races.description:
Frilleum are a long lived and elegant race of dragon-like humanoids. They strongly resemble Frilleus dragons and many worship such creatures. The patron deity of the Frilleum is a space dragoness named Sigrune, a long bodied feathered and furred serpent that endlessly flies through the stars in search of the elusive truth.
(Frilleum Race)
races.name: frilleum

races.description:
The Blood Elves or Sin'dorei in Thalassian ("children of the blood"), are a race composed of former high elves who renamed themselves in honor of their people who were killed during the siege of Quel'Thalas by the Scourge during the Third War.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: bloodelf

races.description:
The draenei (meaning Exiled Ones in their own tongue) are a faction of uncorrupted eredar who fled their homeworld of Argus to escape the corruption of the demonic Burning Legion.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: draenei

races.description:
Dwarves are an ancient bold and courageous race descended from the earthen. Dwarves are short and stout creatures. They are shorter than humans but taller than gnomes, taking advantage of their size when possible and relying on their robustness and strength when not. The average dwarf is steady, observant and composed both during work and combat, yet able to rage with fierce zeal and persistence when the situation calls for it. While a dwarf prefers to plan forward to overcome challenges, many of them easily lose their temperament and self-restraint when exposed to conditions stirring their feelings and concerns.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: dwarf

races.description:
The undead Forsaken or simply the Forsaken and Undead are a race and a faction of intelligent undead who broke away from the Scourge and took control of much of the kingdom of Lordaeron, destroyed during the Third War by the death knight Arthas. While comprised vastly of undead humans, the Forsaken are a diverse faction that include several different races at their biological core. However, they have all assumed their racial identity as "Forsaken," due to their shared goals and loyalties.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: forsaken

races.description:
The Night Elves are a powerful and mystical race whose origins extend back to ancient times. These then-immortal beings were among the first to study magic and let it loose throughout the world nearly ten thousand years before the First War on Azeroth. The far-reaching and ancient legacy of the night elves shaped them into a race of very self-sufficient and self-conscious individuals, who often display strong streaks of isolationism.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: forsakennightelf

races.description:
The Blood Elves or Sin'dorei in Thalassian ("children of the blood"), are a race composed of former high elves who renamed themselves in honor of their people who were killed during the siege of Quel'Thalas by the Scourge during the Third War.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: forsakenhighelf

races.description:
The gnomes (collectively referred to as gnomanity or gnomekind) are a race of diminutive and highly intelligent humanoids, known for their mastery of technology. They were originally descended from mechagnomes, metallic titan-forged, who were afflicted with the Curse of Flesh. Gnomes are a race of ambitious folk that celebrate creativity and craft and whose lives are validated by a masterful command of the scientific laws of the universe. This outlook on life makes them feel that to be pitied is unbearable, even insulting, though they know their allies do not do this intentionally. They have been more of a race of scholars throughout their history, generally focused on escaping and avoiding conflict, being also known to offset their lack of physical strength with ingenuity and daring.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: gnome

races.description:
The goblins (collectively known as goblinhood) are small green humanoids from the Isle of Kezan. Their love of money, explosives, and technology leaves them to be a very dangerous race, both to their enemies and themselves. Most goblins have a neutral standpoint, preferring to sell their contraptions, knowledge and services to other races. Goblins are slight and wiry, averaging 4 feet in height.[21][22][23] They have three fingers and one thumb on one hand and four toes on one foot. Their noses grow larger as they age.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: goblin

races.description:
The High Elves, or Quel'dorei ("children of noble birth"), are a race descended from the Highborne night elves who left Kalimdor and settled in the Eastern Kingdoms, founding Quel'Thalas. The high elves were once a significant force on the continent, but in recent times their numbers have been dramatically reduced: almost 90% of their population in Quel'Thalas was slaughtered during the Third War.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: highelf

races.description:
Humans (collectively referred to as mankind or humanity) are a resilient species native to the world of Azeroth. Recent discoveries have shown that humans are descended from the barbaric half-giant vrykul of Northrend. Though humans are among the younger races on Azeroth, they have faced many challenges with fortitude and resilience. Their continued ability to adapt and rebuild has made them a vital force in an ever-changing world.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: azerothianhuman

races.description:
The Night Elves are a powerful and mystical race whose origins extend back to ancient times. These then-immortal beings were among the first to study magic and let it loose throughout the world nearly ten thousand years before the First War on Azeroth. The far-reaching and ancient legacy of the night elves shaped them into a race of very self-sufficient and self-conscious individuals, who often display strong streaks of isolationism.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: nightelf

races.description:
The orcs are a race native to the world of Draenor, now known as Outland, they arrived to Azeroth through the Dark Portal a massive structure that allowed orcs passage from their world.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: orc

races.description:
The tauren (shu'halo in their native language of Taur-ahe) are a race of large, bovine humanoids who dwell on the great plains of Central Kalimdor. For countless generations, they were constantly harassed by the violent centaur, who forced the tauren into a nomadic lifestyle in the harsh Barrens. Despite their enormous size, the tauren are a peaceful and honorable people who nonetheless are fierce fighters when roused. Hunting and shamanism are held in high regard in their culture, as is their worship of the Earth Mother and respect for the land and nature.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: tauren

races.description:
Trolls (collectively referred to as trollkind) are a diverse sapient race that can be found in every part of Azeroth. They are one of the earliest known native races of Azeroth. Trolls are a species where multiple subspecies exist, these subspecies vary from being tall, lanky and muscular, with each subspecies being different than the others both physically and culturally. They have both elven and orc-like characteristics with their fierce tusks and long ears. Their long arms, strong legs, quick reflexes as well as their incredible agility and strength make them adept hunters.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: troll

races.description:
The worgen are a race of feral wolf-beasts whose very name inspires fear. They are large, lupine humanoids that walk upright, but lope on all fours to run. Being bitten by or drinking the blood of a worgen causes humans and night elves to be transformed into one. After the transformation, those that are overcome by rage and guilt gradually lose all vestiges of their former lives and turn mindless. By controlling their emotions via medication, magic, and self-discipline, worgen may resist being overcome by their feral instincts.
((Ry)Rimcraft)
races.name: worgen
